attributes.action: Stop victimising our soldiers, they were only doing their duty.
attributes.additional_details: Soldiers since the IRA troubles have faced all kinds of problems but have always believed they had the support of the people and the government of the United Kingdom.Today we know the government will sacrifice any soldier to the courts as long as no mention is made of government involvment, this is wrong.!,how far back does the government want to go in its persecution of British soldiers ?,World War 2, the Boer wars?, i am sure war crimes were committed and overlooked, WE were not the aggressors after all, leave our soldiers alone, they only did their duty.
